alert.note: Alert for Crow Wing; South Aitkin; South Cass (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Duluth (Northeast Minnesota and Northern Wisconsin)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 18 at 3:08PM CDT by NWS Duluth
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of west central Aitkin, south central Cass and central Crow Wing Counties through 345 PM CDT... At 307 PM CDT, trained weather spotters reported a strong thunderstorm over Nisswa, or 12 miles north of Brainerd, moving east at 30 mph. Trained spotters northwest of Nisswa reported half-inch sized hail. HAZARD...Half inch hail. SOURCE...Trained weather spotters. IMPACT...Minor hail damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Merrifield around 320 PM CDT. Ironton around 335 PM CDT. Crosby and Cuyuna around 340 PM CDT. Deerwood around 345 PM CDT. Other locations impacted by this storm include Legionville, Wolford, Cedar Lake, North Long Lake, Riverton, Cuyuna Country State Park, Upper Mission Lake, Lake Hubert, Trommald and Lake Shore. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: Anyone outdoors, including anyone on or in the water, should seek shelter inside a sturdy building or hard topped vehicle. This storm may intensify. Monitor local NOAA Weather Radio, commercial radio, or television stations for additional information and possible warnings from the National Weather Service. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 800 PM CDT for north central and east central Minnesota.

area.areaDesc: Crow Wing; South Aitkin; South Cass
